帐号需验证通过才可登录: The account needs to be verified to log in
修改邮箱和删除帐号需要邮箱验证码: Email verification code is required to modify email address and delete account
填写-1则不通知，误差±10分钟: If you fill in -1, you will not be notified, and the error is ±10 minutes
不会向忽略的邮箱地址发送邮件，可使用换行分割多个地址。: Emails will not be sent to ignored email addresses, multiple addresses can be separated by newlines.
邀请码：注册时需填写下方邀请码。: Invitation code: You need to fill in the invitation code below when registering.
禁止查看共享所有人的文件。: Disable viewing of shared owner's files.
禁止创建群聊。: Creation of group chats is prohibited.
自动：密码输入错误后必须添加验证码。: Automatic: A verification code must be added after a wrong password is entered.
开启：每次登录都需要图形验证码。: Enable: A graphic verification code is required for each login.
关闭：不需要输入图形验证。: Closed: Do not need to input graphic verification.
复杂：大于或等于6个字符，包含数字、字母大小写或者特殊字符。: Complex: greater than or equal to 6 characters, including numbers, uppercase and lowercase letters, or special characters.
开启：项目管理员可生成链接邀请成员加入项目。: On: Project administrators can generate links to invite members to join the project.
成员禁言：仅管理员可以发言。: Member Mute: Only administrators can speak.
全部禁言：所有人都禁止发言。: Mute all: Everyone is forbidden to speak.
自动：注册成功后自动进入全员群。: Automatic: After successful registration, you will automatically enter the all-member group.
必填：发送聊天内容前必须设置昵称、电话。: Required: Nickname and phone number must be set before sending chat content.
如果必填，发送聊天前必须设置昵称、电话。: If required, nickname and phone number must be set before sending chat.
允许匿名发送消息给其他成员。: Allows anonymous sending of messages to other members.
禁止匿名发送消息。: Anonymous sending of messages is prohibited.
数码相机4M的图片，优化后仅有700KB左右，而且肉眼基本看不出区别。: The 4M picture of a digital camera is only about 700KB after optimization, and the difference is basically invisible to the naked eye.
是否将消息中的网络图片保存到本地服务器。: Whether to save the network picture in the message to the local server.
是否启动首页: Whether to start the home page
仅支持网页版。: Only the web version is supported.
首页底部：首页底部网站备案号等信息: Bottom of the homepage: information such as website record number at the bottom of the homepage
只能上传图片文件，请重新上传: Only image files can be uploaded, please upload again
这是你的目标整体完成度。: This is your overall completion of the goal.
这是你的目标整体获得评分。: This is your goal to get scored overall.
各部门OKR平均完成度: Average OKR completion degree of each department
各部门OKR评分分布: Distribution of OKR scores by department
2 目标达成效果较差，未及时调整: 2 The achievement of the goal is poor, and the adjustment has not been made in time
4 目标勉强达成，还需努力: 4 The goal is barely achieved, and efforts are still needed
6 目标达成，效果一般: 6 The goal is achieved, the effect is average
请选择目标(O)的周期: Please select the cycle of the target (O)
你确定要取消对齐吗？: Are you sure you want to unalign?
至少需要一个KR！: At least one KR is required!
KR进度尚未达到100%: KR progress has not yet reached 100%
完成全部OKR评分的人员所占比例，一个人如果负责多个OKR，必须全部OKR都完成: The proportion of people who have completed all OKR scoring. If one person is responsible for multiple OKRs, all OKRs must be scored before they are counted as those who have completed the scoring.
各个部门下完成OKR评分的人员所占比例: The proportion of personnel who complete the OKR score under each department
已完成评分的OKR新占比例， OKR里负责人与上级都完成评分， 能计为完成评分的: The new proportion of OKRs that have been graded, the person in charge and the superior in the OKR have completed the grades, can be counted as OKRs that have completed the grades
各个部门完成OKR评分的所占比例: The proportion of OKR scores completed by each department
将客户续约率从70%提高到90%: Increase customer renewal rate from 70% to 90%
不建议超过5个关键KR: No more than 5 key KRs are recommended
O目标已取消无法操作: O target has been canceled and cannot be operated
KR已评分无法操作: KR has been scored and cannot be operated
仅负责人可操作: Only the person in charge can operate
仅限负责人操作: Operations by the person in charge only
我们从过程中学到了什么新东西: What new things did we learn from the process
请描述出现的某个问题并针对该问题展开分析: Please describe a problem that occurred and analyze it
您当前未加入任何部门，不能发起！: You are not currently in any department, cannot start!
仅负责人和负责人上级可以操作！: Only the person in charge and the person in charge can operate it!
O目标已完成无法操作: O The target has been completed and cannot be operated
已完成评分的OKR所占比例，一个OKR里负责人与上级都完成评分，才能计为完成评分: The proportion of OKRs that have been graded. In an OKR, both the person in charge and the superior have completed the grades before they can be counted as OKRs that have been graded.
确定要删除吗？: Are you sure you want to delete [{title}]?
单选：指定可评分部门及部门负责人OKR的人员。: Single choice: Specify the people who can score OKRs for departments and department heads.
自评与上级的占比总和需等于100%。: The sum of the proportions of self-evaluation and superiors must equal 100%.
自评与上级的占比总和需等于100%: The sum of the proportions of self-evaluation and superiors must equal 100%
各人员OKR平均完成度: Average OKR completion degree of each employee
各人员OKR评分分布: OKR score distribution of each personnel
各个人员完成OKR评分的所占比例: The proportion of each person completing OKR scoring
